column4: Hi, I lost the data on the HDD in NTFS. Movies, programs, ISO images ... How can I restore the data?
Hi, I lost the data on the HDD in NTFS. Movies, programs, ISO images ... How can I restore the data?
TestDisk recover single files, but we are here talking about many thousands of files ... Maybe a Windows run a program to recover the wine?
